title: Demand for autos and auto workers

content.question: An increase in the demand for automobiles will cause the demand for skilled automobile workers and the wage rate of skilled automobile workers to change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Demand For Workers Wage Rate Decrease Increase
Demand For Workers Wage Rate Decrease Not change
Demand For Workers Wage Rate Increase Decrease
Demand For Workers Wage Rate Increase Increase
Demand For Workers Wage Rate Not change Increase

content.answer: Demand For Workers Wage Rate Increase Increase

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
